data.title: Administrative services, legal assisting and court reporting
data.meta_description: Do you pride yourself on your organizational skills, attention to detail and ability to interact with a diverse set of people? Do you enjoy executing a process with efficiency and […]
data.meta_site_name: Stark State College | North Canton, Ohio
data.text:
Do you pride yourself on your organizational skills, attention to detail and ability to interact with a diverse set of people?

Do you enjoy executing a process with efficiency and accuracy, keeping proper documentation at each step of the way?

Programs in this Career Community open opportunities to function as important support staff through careers in administrative office professional, judicial court reporting, legal assisting, training and development and transfer options.

Critical skills and abilities

active listening

critical thinking

oral and written communication

time management

Technical skills and knowledge

administration and management

computers and electronics

customer and personal service

data entry software

electronic mail software

Exploratory major

If you know this Career Community is the right fit for you but you’re unsure of your major, choose the administrative services, legal assisting and court reporting exploratory major to get started in the right direction. Your first 15 credit hours are applicable to all majors within this career community and you’ll get the experience to know which major is right for you. See admissions to apply.
